com.badlogic.gdx.backends.iosrobovm

Class IOSMini2DxGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robovm.rt.bro.NativeObject
      • org.robovm.objc.ObjCObject
        • org.robovm.apple.foundation.NSObject
          • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.iosrobovm.IOSMini2DxGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Graphics, org.robovm.apple.foundation.NSObjectProtocol, org.robovm.apple.glkit.GLKViewControllerDelegate, org.robovm.apple.glkit.GLKViewDelegate, org.robovm.objc.ObjCProtocol

    public class IOSMini2DxGraphics
extends org.robovm.apple.foundation.NSObject
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Graphics, org.robovm.apple.glkit.GLKViewDelegate, org.robovm.apple.glkit.GLKViewControllerDelegate
    Based on LibGDX's IOSGraphics class, adds mini2Dx's timestep logic
